articles.content: As a service to fans who have a general interest in WWE but might not have watched a match in months, we're happy to provide this FAQ as a guide to Survivor Series: WarGames, scheduled for Saturday, … [+7465 chars]

articles.title: Lina Ghotmeh reveals deisgn for 2023 Serpentine Pavilion - Dezeen
articles.description: Lebanese architect Lina Ghotmeh is set to create a timber pavilion informed by toguna huts in Mali for next year's Serpentine Pavilion.
articles.content:
Lebanese architect Lina Ghotmeh is set to create a timber pavilion sheltering a low circular table for next year's Serpentine Pavilion.
